channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Arena Breakout Infinite’ Launches Into Early Access With Twitch Drops
item.description: Arena Breakout Infinite is launching in Early Access in a few hours and there will be a massive Twitch Drops campaign to celebrate the launch.

item.title: Mediocrity and perfectionism
item.description: It’s surprising to realize that they’re the same. They are both places to hide. When we ship average work, it’s not our fault. We’re simply doing what the manual says, and if you don’t like it, blame the culture and the system. And when we hold back on shipping because it isn’t perfect, we’re also […]

item.title: How HUMAN Security Is Protecting The Digital Journey
item.description: HUMAN Security now offers AI-derived capabilities like adaptive detection as threat actors pivot their tactics, and malicious traffic attack profiling.

item.title: Fire inspectors
item.description: Running into a burning building is heroic work. Keeping buildings from burning down in the first place is actually just as important. And it scales more reliably.

item.title: Scientists Discover Oceans-Worth Of Liquid Water On Mars—And A Potential Home For Alien Life—But There’s One Big Catch
item.description: Scientists found evidence of enough liquid water to cover the whole of Mars with an ocean around a mile deep that Berkeley researcher Michael Manga said “should, in principle, be able to sustain life.”

item.title: Living in the future
item.description: In a bad 1950s science fiction movie, you might see flying jetpacks, invisibility cloaks and ray guns. What we got instead is a device that fits in our pocket. It allows us to connect to more than a billion people. It knows where we are and where we’re going. It has all of our contacts, […]

item.title: Brandon Sanderson’s Cosmere Role Playing Game Conquers Kickstarter
item.description: Fans of Mistborn and The Stormlight Archive can check out the upcoming role playing game set in those worlds that is currently crowdfunding.

item.title: Adjacent but not relevant
item.description: There’s a sale on band saw blades, including a really good deal on one that fits the saw you owned years ago. The folks who live next door to the house you used to live in are having a raucous party. A guy with a name just like yours wins the lottery… These adjacencies can […]

item.title: Electric Trucks Nearly Killed Nikola. Now Hydrogen Ones Are Saving It.
item.description: The struggling electric truckmaker sells the first commercial fuel cell truck in the U.S., with twice the range of battery models — and so far, drivers love them.

item.title: Silence vs noise
item.description: When a group comes together, noise is easy. Just a few people have to make a commotion for noise to happen. But silence requires everyone to be in sync.
